Question: What is financial difficulty?
Answer: Put simply, financial difficulty is when you can’t pay your bills. It can happen as a result of a job loss, illness, family break ups, natural disasters like droughts or floods and many other reasons.If you can’t make Suncorp Bank loan repayments or meet other financial commitments – or you think you’ll be experiencing difficulty soon – we’re here to help.Please contact us on1800 225 223(8:30am-5pm, Mon-Fri, AEST) orfind out how to submit a request for assistance.
